sentences.sContent: She was barely aware of his presence.
sentences.sCn: 她几乎没有注意到他的存在。

sentences.sContent: Joe and his brother are barely on speaking terms.
sentences.sCn: 乔和他哥哥几乎不说话。

sentences.sContent: ...the phenomenon in which the sun barely sets in northern countries in the summertime...
...Sales in 2009 could be barely half of that...
...When we talk about Americans barely into adulthood who are saddled with unbearable levels of debt...

synos.tran: 仅仅，勉强；几乎不；公开地；贫乏地
